itemDescription: British Royal Air Force air marshal

wikipedia_page.main: Air Chief Marshal Sir Malcolm David Pledger,  (born 24 July 1948) is a retired Royal Air Force officer.

link_mentions.page: Deputy Chief of the Defence Staff

response: * Air Chief Marshal Sir Malcolm Pledger (2002 - 2005)
* 30 April 1999 – 3 September 1999 Air Marshal Malcolm Pledger OBE AFC BSc FRAeS RAF
* Air Chief Marshal Sir Malcolm Pledger OBE AFC, Station Commander from 1990-92 of RAF Shawbury, and Chief of Defence Logistics from 2002–04
* Malcolm Pledger (born 1948), British retired Royal Air Force air chief marshal
